steps.code: let nd = null; try { const s = document.querySelector('script#__NEXT_DATA__'); if (s) nd = JSON.parse(s.textContent); } catch(e) {} const title = document.querySelector('[data-testid="bookTitle"], h1#bookTitle, h1')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const author = document.querySelector('[data-testid="name"], a.ContributorLink, a.authorName, [itemprop="author"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const ratingEl = document.querySelector('[class*="RatingStatistics__rating"], [itemprop="ratingValue"]'); const rating = ratingEl?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const desc = document.querySelector('[data-testid="description"] [class*="Formatted"], [data-testid="description"], #description span, .readable span[style]')?.textContent?.trim()?.slice(0, 1000) || ''; const genres = []; document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="genresList"] a, .bookPageGenreLink, a[href*="/genres/"]').forEach(g => { const t = g.textContent?.trim(); if (t && !genres.includes(t)) genres.push(t); }); const pages = document.querySelector('[data-testid="pagesFormat"], [itemprop="numberOfPages"], p[data-testid="pagesFormat"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const ratingCount = document.querySelector('[data-testid="ratingsCount"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const reviewCount = document.querySelector('[data-testid="reviewsCount"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const img = document.querySelector('[class*="BookCover"] img, #coverImage, img.bookCoverImg')?.src || ''; return { title, author, rating, rating_count: ratingCount, review_count: reviewCount, description: desc, genres, pages, cover_image: img, url: window.location.href };
